fields.headline: Corrections and clarifications
fields.bodyText: • An article (UK tyres deal adds to Japan’s buying spree, 6 January, page 24) said that Takeda Pharmaceuticals had acquired Cambridge-based Crescendo Biologics for $790m. In fact the two companies signed a collaboration and licence agreement worth up to $790m to develop and commercialise Crescendo’s cancer technology. • An editing lapse caused an appreciation of Clare Hollingworth, the British foreign correspondent who has died aged 105, to say that she was still calling a newspaper daily looking for a story “in her late 1970s” (Inspiration who dodged bullets and sexism, 11 January, page 2, early editions). • An article said the boat builders Sunseeker had recently launched a £17m 31ft yacht, too big to fit in a London exhibition centre. It is considerably bigger than that at 131ft (British luxury boat builders toast Brexit sales boost, 7 January, page 24).
